casebody.data:
Adam Jarmal HODGE
v.
STATE of North Carolina No. 182A15-4 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 14, 2018 Steven Armstrong, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina. Adam Jarmal Hodge, for Hodge, Adam Jarmal

ORDER

Upon consideration of the petition filed by Petitioner on the 23rd of April 2018 in this matter for a writ of mandamus, the following order was entered and is hereby certified to the Superior Court, Buncombe County:

"Denied by order of the Court in conference, this the 14th of August 2018."
